entries.name: new(ary_or_hash)
entries.desc: Creates a new Tuple from ary_or_hash which must be an Array or Hash.

entries.name: [](k)
entries.desc: Accessor method for elements of the tuple.

entries.name: each()
entries.desc: Iterate through the tuple, yielding the index or key, and the value, thus ensuring arrays are iterated similarly to hashes.

entries.name: fetch(k)
entries.desc: Fetches item k from the tuple.

entries.name: size()
entries.desc: The number of elements in the tuple.
